I knew someone on Flight 93, it did indeed happen. Not that it will change the minds of the conspiracy nuts out there, or the loose change idiots who think that 400 line resolution shakey video of an object flying ~400mph unrehearsed into a building show that "pods" underneath a plane to hold "bombs".

My ? is this, if thats the case, why wouldn't the gov't just put bombs inside the plane and not on the outside? And why wasn't there a bomb explosion? The explosion when the plane hit was nothing compared to what it should be if it was a conventional bomb.

If the loose change guys were right, they wouldn't be alive right now. End of story.
